data.name: Elusive World Demo
data.detailed_description: (Alpha Build- Not yet available) A teenager lost in a parallel world struggles to find his way back home. An adventure, survival, RPG. Crafting, Combat, Looting, Survival.
data.about_the_game: (Alpha Build- Not yet available) A teenager lost in a parallel world struggles to find his way back home. An adventure, survival, RPG. Crafting, Combat, Looting, Survival.
data.short_description: (Alpha Build- Not yet available) A teenager lost in a parallel world struggles to find his way back home. An adventure, survival, RPG. Crafting, Combat, Looting, Survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5-4590 3.30ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CORE I5-9600K 3.7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There is Melee combat and also the use of range weapon
